author: RUSANMA
post_text: March 4, 2020 at 5:49 PM#1Hi, I have a problem with a macro. I want the selected timecode to set the autostart to `` on '' and the others to off. I have got everyone on with this syntax. assign timecode thru / autostart = on. Thanks
